text.section: The assessment fee imposed on insurers under this subtitle is in lieu of any life insurance valuation fees and a reduction in specified insurance producer fees that the Commissioner had previously charged and collected under § 2-112 of this title.
In determining adjusted premiums subject to the assessment fee, the Commissioner may use the premiums as stated in the report required under § 2-506(a) of this subtitle.
